articles.description: “I want to assure you that BCCI is taking all necessary steps to start a full-fledged women's league soon, says BCCI secretary.
articles.content:
A full-fledged women's Indian Premier League (IPL) could begin as early as next year, with the Indian cricket board (BCCI) saying it is working on delivering the tournament soon.
A three-team Women'… [+2037 chars]
